appDesc.message: 一键批量下载当前新闻页面的相关图片（最大分辨率）。

supportMessageML.message: 暂不支持该网页。你可以通过 这个Google 表单 提交报告来提醒作者。

downloadMobileLabel.description: The text for checkbox that controls whether to include images that is exclusively for mobile apps on mdpr.jp

downloadMobileStatusTextInProgress.description: The text for in progress fetching extra images

downloadMobileStatusTextSuccess.description: The text for successfully fetching extra images

downloadMobileStatusTextNotFound.description: The text for no extra images found (404)

downloadMobileStatusTextFailed.description: The text for failed fetching extra images with any failure other than 404

downloadMobileStatusHelpLink.description: The link that explains additional permission

scanConfirm_scanConfirmText.message: 智能扫描会滚动页面来查找图片，要使用智能扫描吗?
scanConfirm_scanConfirmText.description: The text that explains the Smart Scan feature

scanConfirm_alwaysYesText.description: The text label for alwaysYesText check box
